name: GraduateFactory
overview: Graduate Factory is a EdTech company that builds exciting and interactive innovations to help students turn into successful college graduates! We believe that it’s all about students and providing them with solutions to make the journey from high school to college a smooth transition. While bringing patented international award-winning technology to our tools, we integrate them tightly with the internet, mobile and social media to ensure to keep the ‘fun’ in the process. Our company is based the lovely corner of the world called New Zealand and we are passionate about spreading our tools to the rest of the world. It’s a factory like no other, with a dynamic team of entrepreneurs and academics who bring a fresh new approach to the education sector.
